About

Hey there! This page is included as an example. Feel free to customize it for your own use upon downloading. Carry on!

In the novel, The Strange Case of Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde, Mr. Poole is Dr. Jekyll’s virtuous and loyal butler. Similarly, Poole is an upstanding and effective butler that helps you build Jekyll themes. It’s made by @mdo.

There are currently two themes built on Poole:

  • Hyde
  • Lanyon

Learn more and contribute on GitHub.

Setup

Some fun facts about the setup of this project include:

  • Built for Jekyll
  • Developed on GitHub and hosted for free on GitHub Pages
  • Coded with Sublime Text 2, an amazing code editor
  • Designed and developed while listening to music like Blood Bros Trilogy

Have questions or suggestions? Feel free to open an issue on GitHub or ask me on Twitter.

Thanks for reading!
